campaign.story:
Adiós, 2020! You pile of shit.
If there is ONE THING every human can agree on, it's that 2020 was an absolute shit show.
While some bullshit continues to linger into 2021, we'd like to commemorate our specie's survival the only way we know how; with a new, fun, 39mm 1oz. coin!
Available in 3 Colors
This coin is available for a limited time in three colors. You choose which you'd like, or mix and match your favorites! They are available in:
Copper (Shiny) 
Gold (Shiny) 
Bronze
Fine Details
Nothing says "SHIT SHOW" like an anus stretched out to the MAX, birthing mammoth clumps of crap, and spurting splatters of pressurized feces! (Bronze Coin)

In 2020, all arrows missed the mark! (Copper Coin)
We came, we saw, we survived! (Gold Coin)

What a circus it's been! (Bronze Coin)

 Coin Size/Specs 
Each of the "SHIT SHOW" coins is 1.54" (39mm) in diameter (approximately the same as a Silver Dollar) and .116" thick (3mm), and weighs in at a solid 1oz. These coins are an extremely high quality mint and are akin to a traditional military challenge coin (noticeably larger and heavier than our other regular coins).
Coin Materials/Metals
 Copper - Copper - Our Copper coins are made from .999 pure 1oz AVDP Copper. It is bright in color and very durable. These coins will gain a beautiful patina over time if not polished.
 Gold - Proprietary Blend  - This blend is a solid brass alloy, formulated to look like 18KT gold. Aside from its durability and weight, this alloy reproduces the finest detail. After minting, each coin is individually coated with fine jewelers lacquer to retard tarnishing.
 Bronze - Proprietary Blend  - This blend is the same brass alloy used in the gold version, but is then chemically aged to build up a rich oxidized coating giving it the bronze finish. Upon completion, each coin is also individually coated with fine jewelers lacquer to retard tarnishing.
Stretch Goals
1st 500 Backers a FREE Limited Edition Golden 2021 Zero Fucks Coin!
#1 - **UNLOCKED**  - $5,000 - Once our initial goal is reached, all first-day backers or the first 500 backers (whichever is reached first) will receive a FREE LIMITED EDITION Gold "2021" Zero Fucks/Middle Finger Coin! These coins are a 1-time minting, EXCLUSIVELY for this Kickstarter project!!!

#2 - **UNLOCKED**  - $30,000 - All "Shit Show" coins will be automatically upgraded to be packed in FREE clear protective capsule hard-cases!

Receive a free coin capsule with every coin if goal #2 is unlocked!

#3 - **LOCKED**  - $75,000 - All backers who've pledged $25 or more will receive TWO FREE blemished "2020" Zero Fucks/Middle Finger Coins! 2020 was a "blemished" year in general, so this only seems appropriate.

#4 - **LOCKED**  - $100,000 - All backers who've pledged $25 or more will receive an additional TWO FREE blemished coins, for a total of 4 FREE COINS (or 5 FREE Coins if you're also one of the 1st 500 backers)!!!

100% Designed & Manufactured in the USA!
All of our coins are our original designs, and we take GREAT PRIDE in the fact we design and manufacture all of our coins right here in the good ol' USA!
Timeline
Punctuality is important to us, and we plan to have everything shipped on or before May 1st. All 13 of our previous Kickstarter projects have shipped on-time or ahead of schedule, and this shouldn't be any different!
Pledge With Confidence
We make awesome products, and have OVER 2,000 5-Star Reviews from past customers to prove it! When you pledge for our coins, you know you'll receive an awesome high-quality product - And on time, too!  Just check out the comments on our past campaigns if you need more proof! As a matter of fact, here are just a few previous Kickstarter comments for your convenience:
Thank You!
As you know, we don't give a fuck about much... But making kick-ass high-quality shit, delivering awesome customer service, and showing appreciation to our loyal backers are definitely the exceptions. We wouldn't be continuing to create and make these fun coins if it wasn't for your awesome comments and words of encouragement!
So, THANK YOU! Your'e the best and we wouldn't be here making this newest coin if it wasn't for you!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This our 14th Kickstarter project!

We've become exceedingly efficient at pre-planning, and are very good at what we do. Because of this, we don't expect there to be any real risk or challenge outside of simply getting funded. We've already got the dies made to make the coins, vendors lined up for all the supplies... All we need to do now is fund the initial minimum order requirements for everything - hence this campaign.

That being said, as mentioned before, the biggest risk we face is not getting funded, so don't let that happen!

After you make your pledge to get some of these awesome coins, PLEASE HELP spread the word! Share the link to this project with friends and on your social media accounts and follow us online!

campaign.story:

This 39mm 1oz. commemorative coin celebrates all the hardships we've had to endure together, like keeping 6ft away from each other, being self-isolated, and of course running out of fucking toilet paper! WTF?! 
But hey, we're coming out the other side stronger – and with cleaner hands and cleaner assholes than ever before!  
Available in two colors: Silver & Gold, with a matte/satin finish!
This coin is based on the Kennedy half dollar and updated for today's totally fucked society! We can't even trust the air we breathe without the fear of fucking dying... FUCK COVID-19!

Check Out this AWESOME New Finish!
For the first time ever, we're offering a coin with a satin/matte finish, and it's totally badass!!! All of our previous coins have had shiny backgrounds, which is cool... But this new style is next-level awesome. Take a look for yourself!
PLAY

PLAY


Fine Details
Coin Size/Specs
Each of these "Fuck COVID-19" Coins is 1.54" (39mm) in diameter (approximately the same as a Silver Dollar) and .116" thick (3mm), and weighs in at a solid 1oz. These coins are an extremely high quality mint and are akin to a traditional military challenge coin (noticeably larger and heavier than our other regular coins).

Stretch Goals
Official ZFG Inc. Zero Fucks Given Stickers!
UNLOCKED - $5,000 - Once our initial goal is reached, all first-day backers or the first 500 backers (whichever is reached first) will receive a random FREE STICKER!

UNLOCKED - $75,000 - All backers who've pledged $25 or more will receive a FREE, TOTALLY AWESOME, Mystery Gift! This mystery gift is a product we JUST created, but have not shared with the public YET! :) We will show you the awesomeness as soon as this goal is reached! **CLICK HERE TO SEE THE UNLOCKED GIFT**
**LOCKED** $100,000 - All backers who've pledged one or more coins will receive a FREE Middle Finger Air Freshener! They are double sided/reversible! (Your choice of color as well)
Upgrade to receive a free coin capsule with every coin if the stretch goal is unlocked!
Stretch Goal #4 - A Free Middle Finger Air Freshener!
Timeline
Punctuality is important to us, and we plan to have everything shipped on or before July 17th. All 10 of our previous Kickstarter projects have shipped on-time or ahead of schedule, and this shouldn't be any different (unless there is a second wave of government shutdowns imposed due to COVID-19 – but that is unlikely).

Pledge With Confidence
We make awesome products, and have OVER 2,000 5-Star Reviews from past customers to prove it! When you pledge for our coins, you know you'll receive an awesome high-quality product - And on time, too!  Just check out the comments on our past campaigns if you need more proof! As a matter of fact, here are just a few previous Kickstarter comments for your convenience:
100% Designed & Manufactured in the USA!
Coin Materials/Metals
 Silver - Nickel Silver  - Nickel-Silver is a heavyweight alloy that is is bright silver in color, scratch resistant, non-tarnishing and very durable.
 Gold - Proprietary Blend  - This blend is a solid brass alloy, formulated to look like 18KT gold. Aside from its durability and weight, this alloy reproduces the finest detail. After minting, each coin is individually coated with fine jewelers lacquer to retard tarnishing.
Thank You!
As you know, we don't give a fuck about much... But making kick-ass high-quality shit, delivering awesome customer service, and showing appreciation to our loyal backers are definitely the exceptions. We wouldn't be trying to make this coin if it wasn't for you, your awesome comments and words of encouragement – so THANK YOU VERY MUCH for the motivation and support to make this new badass coin!!!

Dark Mint Chocolate – Sugar, cocoa mass, cocoa butter, soy lecithin (an emulsifier), natural vanilla, essence of peppermint oil.

campaign.story:
Hello, everyone!
Welcome to our 10th Kickstarter project! With over 30 000 desk toys delivered to more than 16 000 people all around the World we are back to show you our newest creation
a Spinning top like no other, designed after a beautiful motion found in nature- the moment of a falling raindrop hitting the surface of water and creating ripples all around.
Combined with the precision machined desktop stand mezmoTop™ makes a timeless desk sculpture- kinetic art piece to compliment any tabletop or shelf.
UNIQUE SPINNING MOTION
Due to it's unique shape and low gravity center mezmoTop™ presents truly amusing and surprisingly stable spinning characteristics. It will spin in multiple ways depending on how you interact with it.
Explore endless ways of motion- spin it smoothly or from an angle, launch them together, throw from a distance or upside down. 
BEAUTIFUL METALS
Crafted out of a solid block of Stainless Steel or Titanium and carefully shaped to replicate the surface of a rippling water. An object that is bending the borders between engineering and art. 
Polished VS Bead blasted
SPINNING BASE
Precisely fitted base combines with the spinning top body creating a one of a kind desk sculpture. Flip it over and it becomes a concave spinning base which allows to achieve rotation times up to 5-6 minutes.
The connection tolerance between mezmoTop™ and the base is so precise that it creates a slight air resistance when the top is placed into the stand. In the close up it looks very satisfying- like the top would slide in a slow motion for a second.
A mesmerizing desk sculpture
THE PERFECT DESK COMPANION
We specialize in creating unique and extraordinary kinetic desk toys that bring a bit of magic in our daily routine and mezmoTop™ is no exception.
The solid body and smooth finish make it very pleasant to interact with and it spins with ease on any desk or flat surface. A simple way to get out of your daily routine and relax between busy working hours.
Rotating still it creates an almost magical impression of a moment when the time stops.
ORIGINAL GIFT
Want to surprise someone? mezmoTop™ makes a truly great and original present that creates a bit of magic every time you interact with it. Each unit is designed with attention to the smallest detail and built to last a lifetime. 
A conversation starter- an eye-catching centerpiece that won't stay unnoticed on any desk or shelf.
But don't take just our word for it.  See what our previous backers are saying about our products:
EXCEPTIONAL PRECISION
With our CNC machines, we are able to achieve such level of precision that is rarely found in regular everyday objects. You’ll instantly notice minutely milled lines and smooth surface texture upon touching mezmoTop™ for the first time!
A tungsten carbide ball is pressed in as a contact point for each spinning top. It guarantees the perfectly smooth rotation and durability. Every unit is manufactured in our local workshop and goes through high standard quality check. The final result is a machined masterpiece that you would enjoy to use every day.
mezmoTop™ is available in two metals and two surface finishes. We offer Stainless steel or Titanium versions, both metals are available with polished or bead blasted (matte) surface finish. 
The finish of the bead blasted Titanium version has a slightly darker tone than the Stainless steel and it is lighter as well. The looks of it reminds me of the surface of the Moon:)
Get both surface versions and switch between bases to create mixed design combinations.
Each spinning top originally comes with a plastic stand to keep it still on your desktop while not spinning.The metal bottom which also serves as a spinning base is available in specific reward levels you can check out below.
I am Kristoph, the 10-time Kickstarter creator, and designer of mezmoTop™. You might know some of my previous projects like Moondrop, Vortecon, Mezmoglobe, ManualPen, Mezmocoin and others. Together with my two brothers and team, we have previously created 9 campaigns with more than 16 000 backers joining us. Our greatest inspiration is the amazing feedback from our supporters.
This is our passion, our hobby, and our job. With every project, we try to bring something new to the World and Kickstarter is an amazing platform to do that. Our supporters get the best price and a unique chance to follow the whole manufacturing process. This time we are excited to get the mezmoTop™ into your hands;)

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 950+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $400M raised between them.

Modern, Minimalist, Functional, Decorative, Kitchen Storage and More!
Countertop Fitness is an innovative container rack system that puts your regularly used items at your fingertips. Not only is its vertical design space saving (35% less!), but its visually attractive with its minimalist modern flair. We love it for nutritional supplements but its something that everyone with a kitchen can use and even for those who don't! It's all up to your imagination. Use it in your workshop, office, kids playroom, ect.
 Dimensions with containers: 15 1/2" Tall, 19" Wide, 8" Depth.
Container Sizing: Large 7" tall 4"x 4" wide and holds 1750ml, Small 3 1\2" tall 4"x 4" wide and holds 950ml. 
Air tight. 
BPA free.
The containers alone are 19" wide and 8 "deep. With Countertop Fitness modern vertical design you're saving approximately 35% of lean countertop space!
 No more bulky countertops and pantry! Countertop Fitness keeps your kitchen lean with its minimalist vertical modern design.
 The CF1 system is comprised of 4 large and 4 small containers in the rack.
The CF2 system is comprised of 2 large containers and 2 small containers.
Future Changes and Product Updates
We love the turquoise but its not for everyone. For that reason the lids will be white not turquoise. Countertop Fitness will have different colors in the future and goals for licensing sports teams, comic book characters, movies, ect. We plan to scale having more products like a carrying case, vitamin holder, wall mount system, and different configurations.
Why Crowdfunding?
Our trusted manufacturing partners need a minimum financial commitment from us to get started on a larger manufacturing run. This is why we have set our funding goal to $5,000. By achieving this funding goal, we are able to put in a larger order to enable us to serve the customer demand, as well as packaging, shipping, marketing, ect. We will be able to reinvest those funds back into the business to fund a larger continuous marketing campaign with more ads, attending events, and seeking distribution. We want to reach our goals as a successful company with the ability to increase the workforce, empower women as ambassadors, and give back to community. 
Special thanks and heartfelt appreciation to our backers and friends who have helped along the way. You're making goals and dreams come true. Without goals all you have are dreams. Taking action changes everything. Thank you so very much!

updates.update_content:
THANKS TO ALL OF OUR BACKERS!!! WE WON'T STOP!!! Please follow us on Facebook and Instagram for updates.
Well its been a wild emotional ride but unfortunately we are not going to make our goal. My friend Rob said "You will learn a lot". I thought it was odd of him to say that but he was right... Lesson one: People don't like DM or email and fear spam like the actual food Spam. Even your friends and few will back your project. (The 80-20 rule is real) Lesson 2: The word "Fitness" in Countertop Fitness scares people. Or at least people who didn't get that fitness meant making your countertops less bulky and trying to get the assumed main market to take notice. Lesson 3: Marketing takes money. Lesson 4: Facebook Ads are hard but are a necessary evil. Lesson 5: People have and extremely short attention span and don't like to read. Lesson 6: Kickstarter tells you people want to hear your story. No one wants to hear your story. They want to know what your product is and how it will enrich their lives... I could go on but I may have lost some of you already lol. We are going to change the name, make a new video, and concentrate on the Mommy market in a couple of months. I'm not a Mom but I love it too. It makes our cool kitchen look more cool while serving a great purpose. Which means we have to work on how to get it in front of the right people.  There is no such thing as failure. Its a lesson in life. You learn, regroup, and conquer. That's exactly what we plan to do.

We have partnered with another cool campaign. Check this one out!
http://cp.go2.fund/tastestick2

I have been working on many ideas over the years and one thing always rings true. Dreams are nothing without goals and action. This is what we believe in and strive for. Thanks for joining us on our journey. I will keep making updates at least once per week if not more. Your support of us and the sharing of our campaign means the world to us.

With your help, we crushed our Kickstarter goals last time
Now we are back with Ogre Sauce Hot - a Different kind of spicy BBQ sauce.
You crushed our last Kickstarter goal.
We have perfected our Ogre Sauce Hot recipe and have already been selected to be in the hot sauce bar at 130 Tijuana Flats locations nationwide. 
Now, we need your help to bring our All-Purpose Hot BBQ Sauce to market so everyone can enjoy it.
Our vision is to continue to be different than other sauce companies. We will use the money raised to start producing and selling Ogre Sauce Hot.
A hot version of Ogre Sauce has been the #1 request since day one. We have been working on adding the perfect amount of heat without changing the flavor of the original Ogre Sauce for a long time. We've done it. Now we need to raise enough money produce a batch for you and the world.
About Ogre Sauce
Ogre Sauce is an All-Purpose BBQ Sauce created in Charlotte NC. We call it "All-Purpose" because it can used on so many foods, with mouth watering results - not just traditional barbecue. Mike "Ogre" Weeks found his grandmother's recipe, made it his own, and before long he was selling it in 5 gallon buckets out of the trunk of his car. With the recipe perfected, we bottled it, and now want the whole world to taste it.
We are back with a new spicy version of the original Ogre Sauce recipe. We are still all natural, with no high fructose corn syrup or preservatives, but now our sauce has a very very small amount of Carolina Reaper. Don't be scared - even though South Carolina's Reaper is called the world's hottest pepper, we use such a small amount that it has a kick without being too hot. 
Ogre Sauce Hot is a medium-hot version of the award-winning Ogre Sauce. 
Not too hot, but spicy enough to give your food a kick.
Not too hot. Middle Weight.
We are going on the Tijuana Flats hot sauce bar. How cool is that?
Thank you so much for your support. The prices were set so that we can not only cover the cost of making and shipping some sauce to you, but also use the money to help us produce some inventory and bring it to the world. Thank you again for all of the love and support you have already given us.
As a Thank You all Rewards come with an Ogre Sauce beer Koozie, a sticker, and the one-of-a-kind Ogre Sauce cookbook.

The Wootz EDC is the ideal tool for any adventure where weight and space are a consideration. Its versatility makes it a must-have companion for every adventurer, or eighter you’re just grilling in the backyard with a cold one.

campaign.story:
Introducing the Chase - an everyday carry pocket knife made to do hard work and look damn good while doing it!  As you’d expect from Quiet Carry, we’ve worked in some gorgeous lines to create a grippy workhorse worthy of the centerstage.
This is an EDC tool that produces real results.  Function, beauty, and value...
The Inspiration
The is Chase is designed to do what a everyday knife is supposed do - excel at a variety of tasks. We found our inspiration for the Chase in the utility of the classic fixed blade knife and gave it a stellar appeal. With its delicate balance and ergonomics, this style of knife is designed with utility in mind. We wanted to bring the rugged and utilitarian features of the fixed blade into a sleek and civilized package that is just at home in the woods as it is at the office. The Chase is the amalgam of these two philosophies.
Please note: You will be able to choose your handle and blade finish in the ending survey for all pledges >>
The Form
The Chase boasts many rugged features that suggest hard use, but you certainly couldn’t tell by just looking at it. It features clean lines —creating a satisfyingly symmetrical silhouette. Let’s just say that this is one of those times when it’s okay to stare...
When closed the sleekness of the Chase also shows through. We’ve generously recessed the blade for a slim carry and more discreet look that won’t startle the passer-by.
 Specifications
Blade Length: 2.95” 
Handle Length: 3.96" 
Blade Material: N690co Stainless Steel Blade 
Blade Type: Drop point 
Option 1 Handle Material: G10 fiberglass epoxy resin weight: 2.8 oz 
Option 2 Handle Material: Sea GreyHand poured resin weight: 2.6 oz
Blade Grind: Flat
Lock: Liner Lock
Blade thickness: 0.104 inches
Blade Coating: PVD coating
Clip Coating: PVD coating
Washers: Phosphor bronze
Carry Type: Tip-up
The N690 grade of steel is produced by a small Austrian steel plant that also provides steel for surgical instruments. The key to the hardness of N690 is the addition of cobalt in the steel matrix. The cobalt creates uniformity in the structure within the steel. The value of cobalt in a knife blade is it produces a fine edge with excellent edge retention. Target hardness is 60 HRC. 
The Handle
A hard use knife needs some hard use scales/handle, so we’ve outfitted the Chase with textured G10—a fiberglass-based epoxy resin laminate that is impervious to water, easy to maintain, and extremely strong. Naturally, the Chase excels outdoors and is eager to get dirty. What’s more, these G10 scales are lightweight for unobtrusive everyday carry.
The Chase measures in at 6” but with the wider blade helps with bigger tasks. We’ve also added a bit more width into the handle/scales to help fill your palm for a comfortable and secure grip. It also has a deep finger notch with a tucked away liner lock release to further promote grip and control.
The Chase is also offered in gorgeous Sea Grey scales with a smooth matte finish. Made of hand-poured resin and made in small batches, this handle option features a mesmerizing marbling pattern of sea green and dark grey. What we really love about these scales is the authentic feel. No two scales have the same pattern—making for a knife that is truly one-of-a-kind.
The Clip
When you’re on the move, a deep carry pocket clip affixed to the handle ensures you can carry the Chase discreetly. This knife disappears in your pocket and is as unassuming as a ballpoint pen. We find that big clunky clips are not necessary and a small secure clip placed in the right location is all you need. Of course, with the understated beauty of the Chase, you’ll hardly want this knife disappearing anywhere in all honesty.
Streamlined - No Clunk
 The Blade
We wanted the Chase to excel in a range of tasks, so durability and versatility were our foremost priorities when designing the blade and handle. The blade steel is corrosion-resistant N690 Cobalt Stainless Steel. We also offer a protective PVD blade coating to go the extra mile in wet environments.
The Chase sports a drop point with a generous belly that cuts, chops, and slices. Deep jimping on the spine of the blade enhance traction and inspires confidence in hand. At 2.95” long and 1” wide at its widest point, this blade offers the strength of a bigger knife while staying within legal carry limits. When clipped to your pocket, the Chase features a tip-up configuration that—when combined with the thumb cutout—makes for some easy and smooth actuation. Blade comes with a flat grind.
The Feel
A knife can only be as great as the man or woman that wields it, so we’ve made it a priority that the Chase inspires the utmost confidence every time it’s in your hand. Its full, curving body sits naturally in your palm for a comfortable and secure grip. The textured G10 scales double down on traction even in moist conditions.
The Chase uses phosphor bronze washers for smooth action and easy maintenance. This versatile EDC is equipped with a stainless steel liner lock and a crisp click that accompanies the locking of the blade.
The Function & Practicality
The Chase is one tough knife—one that handles various tasks with ease. Given that our inspiration was the classic fixed blade knife, the Chase is a folding knife that boasts practical and utilitarian features that will get the job done. Where the Chase distinguishes itself is its sleek and elegant form that lends itself to fuss-free carry in more civilized settings.
Quality
These knives are custom manufactured. Every corner has been meticulously machined. The phosphor bronze pivot, PVD-coated N690 steel blade, strong deep pocket clip, and textured G10 are quality materials that make a knife that lasts.
These knives are exceptionally made with tight tolerances, which demands more time, skill, and precision to make them. We make well-thought out knives and cutting tools.  We combine simple clean design while excelling in function.
 The Warranty
Here at Quiet Carry, we’re proud of our work, and we never settle for anything less than the best. The top quality materials, machining and construction. We’re so confident that our knives will serve you and serve you well that every Quiet Carry knife comes with a lifetime warranty.
We are humble yet proud of our products, and we’re glad that those of you that have your own Quiet Carry knife love them, too. Here is what our supporters have to say about our products: 
an Jelinek on December 21, "Received both of my knives and I’m highly impressed with the craftsmanship, superb fit and finish. This is the kind of quality tool that becomes part of you. I don’t leave the house now without one of them, have been using them in the field on my job daily. Great job!"
Mike Ryan on December 16, "Bryce, The Strand arrived today. It is everything I was expecting. The design is classic and the quality is such that it rivals much more expensive knives. To you and your family Bryce merry Christmas and thank you. To those folks who have not received their knives yet, be patient the wait is worth it."
David Dilworth on December 13, "Satin West just arrived. Wow, this is a great little knife. Fit and finish is awesome, and the design is such a nice hybrid of traditional and modern. This is going in my coin pocket daily."
TONY NIVICKI on August 27, "I'm an extremely satisfied customer of Quiet Carry for the 4th time. Beyond happy with my new Q2s and Shorty. Great products and exceptional customer service. Keep up the great work Bryce and I look forward to any new projects. Thanks Again. TONY"
Mark "HoverDonkey" "Craig on April 23, "Received mine today and was immediately impressed by the quality. Obsessively opened and closed it for a couple of hours whilst watching TV, the action was so satisfying! By no means cheap, but I'm confident that it will last for decades - really well constructed item, made with well specced materials. Not only that, but it was manufactured, shipped and delivered well in advance of my expectations! Thanks!"
Yair Gal on April 16, "My two arrived today. Nicely made and well finished. Opened and closed the thing for 10 minutes to enjoy the positive action which feels just right - what you expect in a full sized folder just smaller... Spyderco Bug removed from my keychain and replaced with this knife. The Bug is much smaller and rounder, with a similar sized blade in a smaller package, but nowhere near as cool. Good job guys!"
The Reward
We are grateful for our Kickstarter support and are extremely excited about the Chase. We would not be here if it were not for this community platform so we are pricing exclusively for you, our supporters!
The Bandit & Friend

Add a extra set of scales to any pledge.
1 x Black $22

(please note: you will not be able to add an extra set of Sea Grey - see details in the update)
Project Overview
The goal of the Chase was to create a hard use tool/knife made to get dirty in an elegant design. We have experimented with various shapes, materials, and thicknesses not only to get the ergonomics and aesthetics how we wanted them but also to meet the tight tolerances that constitute a long-lasting product. We have learned that with time and patience our vision will come together, and it goes without saying that a lot of work went into getting the Chase just right. Function, beauty, and value is our mission.
The Quiet Carry Team
We are well-versed in the the production of knives and titanium products. This is what we love. This is what we do!
We are a very small humble company that let our products speak for themselves. We stand behind our products and never settle for anything other than high quality standards. We have been featured in some great publications including Cool Material, Gear Hungry, Everyday Carry, and Uncrate.
Our campaigns are run with integrity, and we will not spam you with advertising updates nor do we trade your information. However, we will always keep you informed on the latest progress. We pride ourselves on having excellent customer service and we stand behind our products. You can rest assured your time and investment is in good hands. We love to hear your ideas and feedback so please keep the great suggestions coming. Thank you all! 
Sincerely, 
Bryce

campaign.story:
Vortecon is a precision machined desk toy that creates a mesmerizing optical illusion when spun. Simply rotate it to reveal the mind-bending effect of a continuously flowing helix. 
A piece of kinetic art that invites you to transform it from precisely engineered still shape into hypnotic optical illusion. Vortecon is made out of solid stainless steel, brass or copper. It has a helix-shaped groove milled alongside the edge that continues as a symmetrical spiral on the top plane. 
When revolving it creates an almost magical effect that looks like continuously flowing helix would merge into a surface of tabletop.
Vortecon is designed to spin on any desk or flat surface. The solid body and smooth finish make it very pleasant to interact with. It spins silently so you won't be bothering anyone around.
Perfect for creators, makers, thinkers and anyone who wants to release their inner creativity and imagination. Keep focus, relieve stress or simply relax during working hours or brainstorming sessions.
Spin Vortecon and it will turn into a dynamic sculpture that changes its patterns along with direction and speed of rotation. There are multiple ways you can interact with Vortecon - spin it as a single unit or stack them together to make it look even more impressive.
Each Vortecon has a rotating base that is equipped with high quality stainless steel bearing. It guarantees smooth and silent spin as well as long lasting. The base is removable to easy access the bearing.
We believe optical illusion is a unique way to bring excitement to anyone. Vortecon makes a truly great and original present that creates a bit of magic every time you interact with it. Each unit is designed with attention to the smallest detail and built to last a lifetime.
We love to see the reactions when someone spins Vortecon for the first time. It instantly creates that ''WOW'' effect. The most frequent ones: WHAT?!..., Again please..., HOW?!....:)...
Every Vortecon is manufactured on aerospace-grade lathes from solid brass, copper or stainless steel. With our CNC machines, we are able to achieve such level of precision that is rarely found in regular everyday objects. You’ll instantly notice minutely milled lines and smooth surface texture upon touching Vortecon for the first time!
Stainless Steel Vortecon
Stainless Steel is durable and corrosion resistant metal. It is perfect for creating an object that will last forever- even after hundred years it will look as good as new. 
Copper Vortecon
Copper is very dense and unique metal that will attain beautiful tarnish over the time. It means that it will slowly darken and get its own unique pattern. 
Many love copper for its characteristics. It is pretty easy to renew the shiny surface with any of widely available polishing kits. 
Brass Vortecon
Brass is beautiful metal with a yellowish tone. It has pretty similar characteristics with copper- it is very dense and heavy. After a bit longer time it will attain the unique patina effect as well.
               Know someone who you think might be interested in this project? Spread a word- it will help us bring new upgrades and stretch goals.
Hello, I am Kristoph, the creator, and designer of Vortecon. You might know me from my previous Kickstarter projects - Moondrop, Gr2 Spheres and others. Together with my two brothers and team, we have created four successful campaigns with more than 4000 backers joining us. One of our greatest inspirations is the amazing feedback we get from our supporters:
In our team, everyone is a creator and we truly love what we are doing. This is our passion, our hobby, and our job. Kickstarter is an amazing platform where we can offer our supporters a great price and unique chance to follow whole manufacturing process. We can't wait to get the VORTECON into your hands;)

  Literally give a Rat's Ass!

  Hey fellow Kickstarters! We're back with the most requested coins you asked for, and they are totally badass!
Just like before, we've already got the dies made and are production ready... Now we just need your help funding the initial minimum order requirements to mint these masterpieces!
Scroll down to check out all of the awesome reward options, kick-ass stretch goals, and more!
Coin Sizes
          Decision Maker coin: Each Decision Maker is 1.54" in diameter (approximately the same as a Silver Dollar) and .116" thick, and weighs in at a solid 1oz. These coins are an extremely high quality mint and are akin to a traditional military challenge coin.
Rat's Ass coin: Each Rat's Ass is 1.073" in diameter, and .080" thick. They are noticeably larger, thicker, and significantly heavier than a US Quarter. If you are familiar with our 2017 Zero Fucks Coins, they are the same size and material as those.
Rewards
   
Stretch Goals
$25K Stretch Goal - 2 FREE Flying Fuck Coins
    $50K Stretch Goal - FREE Protective Coin Capsules
    $75K Stretch Goal - 2 FREE Shit Coins
   $25,000 - UNLOCKED - All backers who've pledged $10 or more will receive *2 FREE "Flying Fuck" Coins!
$50,000 - LOCKED - All backers who've pledged for any Decision Maker Coin(s) will be automatically upgraded to have their coins packed in clear protective capsule hard-cases.
$75,000 - LOCKED - All backers who've pledged $10 or more will receive *2 FREE "Shit" Coins! These FREE "Shit" Coins are in addition to the  previously included "Flying Fuck" Coins, for a total of 4 FREE Coins included in your reward package!
*The free stretch goal coins are from our blem/scratch and dent surplus. For one reason or another, these coins didn't pass our initial quality inspection. They might have scratches, dents, dings, or marks. They might be perfect too. It's a mixed bag. In any event, we'd rather see them put to good use rather than just scrap them.
Coin Materials/Metals
100% Designed and Manufactured in the USA!
   Decision Maker (Gold) - Proprietary Blend
This blend is a solid brass alloy, formulated to look like 18KT gold. Aside from it's durability and weight, this alloy reproduces the finest detail. After minting, each coin is individually coated with fine jewelers lacquer to retard tarnishing.
Decision Maker (Bronze) - Proprietary Blend
This blend is the same brass alloy used in the gold version, but is then chemically aged to build up a rich oxidized coating giving it the bronze finish. Upon completion, each coin is also individually coated with fine jewelers lacquer to retard tarnishing.
Decision Maker (Silver) - Nickel-Silver
Nickel-Silver is a heavyweight alloy that is is bright silver in color, scratch resistant, non-tarnishing and very durable.
Rat's Ass - Nickel-Silver
Nickel-Silver is a heavyweight alloy that is is bright silver in color, scratch resistant, non-tarnishing and very durable.
Holiday Delivery
Nothing Says "Season's Greetings" like a close up of a rat's anus
  Punctuality is important to us! If you are a previous customer, or previous backer, you know we always deliver! Just look at our previous project, we actually delivered ahead of schedule.
Each side of the Decision Maker is marked with a ZFG (Zero Fucks Given) "H" for heads, and "T" for tails

Our estimated Ship date is December 15th.
Shipping generally takes 3-4 days for US/Domestic orders, so we estimate that you should receive your rewards (in the US) by December 20th. This IS NOT a guarantee, but it is the most likely scenario.
International orders, we CANNOT promise delivery in time for X-mas. Most transit times take about 10-days, and that does not include any delays with customs, which there usual are. Because of this, it is highly unlikely any International shipments will arrive before December 25th.
Share Our Project

campaign.story:
“Pip N’ Rads” is a 24pg black & white comic book. I began drawing it during the 24hr comic day at Time Warp Comics in Boulder, CO. My goal is to create Pip N’ Rads as an ongoing comic series. 
I have 20 of the 24 pages inked and now I need your help to meet the minimum print requirements to produce the first issue! 
For your pledge you will get the first issue of PnR as well as other sweet rewards exclusive to this kickstarter. Backing the first issue is getting in at the start of the greatest apocalypse ever!
   "For my 7th birthday I asked for a ride-able Giddy-Up Buttercup robotic toy horse; mom & dad gave me a Chryo-Shelter from the very trendy catalog Enjoy the Apocalypse. It seated 1 child plus 1 stuffed animal.  That night the Apocalypse began; " ~ Pip
Big adventures can begin with the smallest quests; in this first issue Pip has Rads helping him search the wastelands for a childhood toy that he still longs for.
  In this post-apocalyptic world only children survived chryo-sleep. In this land Pip's "Home" is an elephant shaped building, robots have free will, radiation fused creatures roam and duster gangs run amok...
. . . Lucky for Pip that his childhood imaginary best friend Rads is now a 14ft tall sword wielding and completely vulgar super panther. 
  Want your own character of the Apocalypse? Check the Drawing Rewards out...
        New Stretch Goals! For all physical rewards and a sweet variant cover for all $25+ Rewards. Lets do it!
  More fun stuff is possible but only with your support. Thanks for backing & sharing!
Pip N' Rads ride a mine cart to ambush a group of Dusters! da na na....

campaign.story:
ROTO is a wireless 3-speaker system in a vintage rotary phone. It is a retro throwback integrated with modern technology. And it sounds incredible. 
Each ROTO is a custom-built 3-speaker system of the highest quality, encased within an ACTUAL upcycled vintage rotary phone. It is the first functional conversation-piece that proudly pairs the innovation of yesterday with the innovation of today. And there will only be 100 of them created. Ever.
The Western Electric Co. produced this iconic piece of technology during the mid-20th century. Since the advent of digital phones, these rotary phones have disappeared into obscurity. Now they are back (for a limited time) with a twist of functionality, sounding better than ever.
ROTO connects wirelessly to your smartphone, tablet, laptop, etc... using the wireless technology that your device already has. 
The handset rotates horizontally to reveal two additional speakers.
The speaker system boasts a 4" mid-bass driver with excellent bass response, and two 1" tweeters for crisp high frequencies. The back panel features an AUX cable jack, two USB ports for charging your phone/tablet/laptop/etc..., a power switch, and a DC power jack.
  AUX cable jack, two USB charging ports, power switch, and DC power jack
  ROTO provides stellar audio while adding character and interest to any room in your home.
  it sounds as good as it looks
  disassembly and upcycle
  "holed" the phone!
   FAQ: the nuts & bolts
Please read all of this section. These are things you should absolutely know as you pledge on this project...
1. Is ROTO "brand new?" Yes and no. The audio components are brand new and of the highest quality. The phone case is NOT new. It is vintage; that is a large part of the appeal and uniqueness of this project! These phones come from multiple sources, and in some cases the date of manufacture ranges from 30-60 years ago. They will have wear, they will have scratches. That's what gives them character. With that said, they will not have humongous cracks or be structurally unsound. These phone cases were built tough and rugged (as was typical of things from that era), so the durability is there, but, again, they will definitely have the look of some wear and tear.
2. Can ROTO connect (get signal) from the USB ports? No. The two USB ports are solely for charging your devices. With that said, you can certainly have your device charging via the USB port while it is simultaniously connected wirelessly to ROTO, playing sweet music while your device charges. 
3. Why is the price so high? The parts and components are high quality and pretty expensive. Additionally, the amount of time it takes to disassemble, upcycle, build, and test each unit is considerable; many hours for each unit. Many comparable in-home (non-portable) wireless speakers available at major electronics stores cost upwards of $200-300. Finally, this is not a mass-produced product; this is a hand-built item of my own creativity, made just for you.
4. Can I choose the color? Yes, unless there is an unforeseen shortage. They will be black or white. With that said, if I receive an overwhelming amount of orders and my supplier cannot supply enough black or white phones, I will have to use whatever color is available to me. I don't foresee this actually being a problem, but please remember these phones are fairly scarce nowadays and I will have to work with what is available. You may wind up with a white one, a red one, a green one, etc... If it actually comes down to that, I will attempt to ask for each backer's preference, and while no guarantees will be made on color, I will try my hardest to accommodate requests.
5. How long will they take to deliver? A while! 2-3 months minimum AFTER the campaign has ended. Maybe even slightly longer. I am one person, not a giant company, and I will be building each one with as much care and precision as possible. It will take time.
6. Is it battery-powered or does it plug into the wall for power? It plugs into the wall. It has no batteries. The DC power adapter is included with the unit.
7. How does the handset stay in-place when it is rotated up horizontally? Two sets of hidden neodymium magnets hold the handset rotated up. The magnets are hidden when the handset is in its original orientation (speakers facing the floor). You can choose to rotate them up, or leave them down. It's mostly an aesthetic choice on your part, but keep in mind that the tweeters will have better projection if the handset is rotated up. There is no switch to turn the tweeters on or off. They are always on when the unit is powered on.
8. Does ROTO have a volume control? No. Volume will be controlled from the device that is supplying the music.
9. Is there a cover/grill for the exposed speaker? No. If you have kids that like to poke shiny expensive things, keep ROTO out of their reach!

Building each ROTO by hand, with a high level of care and precision, will take a fair amount of time. That is the challenge. Therefore, some of you will receive your reward before others do. There isn't any favoritism happening here, just the nature of taking care and time with building each ROTO individually.

Ogre Sauce is a Different kind of BBQ sauce.
About Ogre Sauce 
Ogre Sauce is an All-Purpose BBQ Sauce created in Charlotte NC. We call it "All-Purpose" because it can used on so many foods, with mouth watering results - not just traditional barbecue. Mike "Ogre" Weeks found his grandmother's recipe, made it his own, and before long he was selling it in 5 gallon buckets out of the trunk of his car.  With the recipe perfected, we bottled it, and now want the whole world to taste it. 
We are making a name for ourselves in the Charlotte area, but we have hit a wall. In order to continue innovating and growing WE NEED YOUR HELP. 
Our vision is to continue to be different than other sauce companies. We will use the money raised towards Ogre Sauce product innovations.
Your support will help us bring new and innovative products to the sauce market, such as
Yearly sauce subscription plans 
 Craft 6-packs 
Work towards becoming Certified Organic and Certified Gluten Free 
Create new varieties such as Vegan and Spicy
 The funding will help with
Research and Development 
Testing for Certification 
Ingredient sourcing 
 Packaging
Ogre Sauce is in a few stores and restaurants in the southern U.S., but if we raise $6,000 or more:
We will be able to place a minimum size order that is big enough to bring our manufacturing costs way down. 
 Big savings for us means big saving for our backers. 
 More resources for marketing, so we can tell the world what our fans already know, Ogre Sauce is amazing! More food and beer festivals, more food trucks, more restaurants, more stores. We love being in Whole Foods, but we love meeting fans directly more!
From our bottle, to our name, to Ogre's remarkable story, to our one-of-a-kind recipe, Ogre Sauce is unlike any sauce you've tasted.
You wouldn't call Prince "just a musician".
You wouldn't call bacon "just food".
You wouldn't call Sriracha "just hot sauce".
Ogre Sauce is not "just BBQ sauce".
When grilled, Ogre Sauce caramelizes. Your food will have an amazing crispy bark on the outside, and a bold juicy flavor inside.
As a dip or condiment, Ogre Sauce packs more flavor than Ketchup, Mustard, and Hot Sauce. You wouldn't believe how good Ogre Sauce is on a Cuban sandwich instead of mustard, or on a hotdog instead of ketchup, or on a pretzel or veggie instead of ranch. Try it with Tater Tots...your head will explode.
All-Purpose Craft BBQ Sauce 
"All-Purpose"
Ogre Sauce can be used perfectly on traditional BBQ foods like ribs, chicken, wings, brisket, tips, chops, porkbelly, sausage, burgers, and hotdogs...but also can be eaten on pizza, sandwiches, steak, tots, fries, and in a Bloody Marys (see Ogre Mary recipe below).
"Craft"
This is a homemade recipe made with only the highest quality, all-natural ingredients in small batches. Like craft beer-brewers, we are small, independent, and dedicated to quality.
"BBQ Sauce"
Make no mistake...we love barbecue. Ogre's grandmother didn't set out to make a condiment that can be used on pizza, she had pork in mind. Those of you who love barbecue know how smoke, heat, meat, and sauce combine to make something irresistible. Ogre Sauce combines elements of traditional Eastern North Carolina BBQ (vinegar) with traditional Western North Carolina BBQ (tomato) elements of traditional South Carolina BBQ (mustard, honey) to create an award winning flavor.
Since Ogre Sauce is sold at Whole Foods Markets, we meet their strict standards..."We feature foods that are free of artificial preservatives, colors, flavors, sweeteners, and hydrogenated fats."
We use all-natural ingredients. That means:
Preservative Free 
No high fructose corn-syrup
Dye Free 
Vegetarian Friendly 
We are in 6 Whole Foods now, but lets go for all of them!

Beer festivals, food trucks, bourbon tastings, chill cook-offs and hotdog eating contests are way more fun than store shelves. VA, or the Vegetarian Food Truck & Craft Beer Festival in Watertown, MA.

How cool would it be to have our sauce on every foodtruck around the world, the same way ketchup and hotsauce are?
With your help, WE CAN MAKE IT HAPPEN. 
We are different than the big companies like Sweet Baby Rays, KC Masterpeice, and Kraft Original. Those corporations make a fine sauce, but they make it in bulk to sell in bulk via big box stores. We make craft sauce that we sell to our friends, new and old, who often find us online after tasting our sauce at backyard bbq's with friends, beach parties, beerfests, and kickball tournaments.

We love the support from our home town establishments who proudly carry Ogre Sauce. Thank you Charlotte, NC!

What people are saying about Ogre Sauce
CUBAN OGRE 
1 baguette or use ciabatta bread 
Thinly sliced cooked ham 
Pulled pork 
1 bottle Ogre Sauce 
Thinly sliced Swiss cheese 
Whole dill pickles, thinly sliced lengthwise 2 tablespoons 
unsalted butter (1/4 stick), melted 
Heat the oven to 200°F and arrange a rack in the middle. Cut the loaf of bread in half horizontally and open it up like a book. Spread the Ogre Sauce on the bottom piece of bread. 
Evenly place the ham and roasted pork on top of the Ogre Sauce. Evenly arrange the cheese and pickles on the meat. 
Pour Ogre Sauce liberally over meat and pickles and top piece of bread and close the sandwich. Press gently on the top to compact the sandwich slightly. Cut it in half crosswise; set both halves aside.
Lay 2 (20-inch-long) sheets of aluminum foil on a work surface. Brush half of the melted butter on the tops of the sandwiches. Place each sandwich butter-side down on the sheets of foil. Brush the bottoms of the sandwiches with the remaining butter. Fold the foil around the sandwiches to cover. 
Heat a large frying pan on low heat until hot, about 4 minutes. Place 1 wrapped sandwich in the pan. Place a cast-iron skillet, Dutch oven, or heavy pot on the sandwich, push down on the skillet or pot to further compact the cubano, and cook undisturbed for 10 minutes. 
Remove the skillet or pot (careful: It may be hot). Flip the sandwich and place the skillet or pot back on top of it. Cook undisturbed until the cheese has melted and the sandwich is warmed through, about 10 minutes more. Remove to the oven and repeat with the second sandwich. When both are ready, remove the foil, cut into pieces, and serve.
OGRE CHICKEN THIGHS
4 pounds of thighs (wings are great too), skin-on 
Kosher Salt 
Vegetable oil 
1 cup Ogre Sauce
Salt and oil chicken pieces: Coat the chicken pieces with Ogre Saucel and sprinkle salt over them on all sides. 
Prepare the grill grill: Brush grill grates with vegetable oil to prevent sticking. Prepare one side of your grill for high, direct heat. If you are using charcoal or wood, make sure there is a cool side to the grill where there are few to no coals. 
Sear chicken on hot side of grill, move to cool side: Lay the chicken pieces skin side down on the hottest side of the grill in order to sear the skin side well. Grill for 5-10 minutes,. Once you have good dark color from the Ogre Sauce on one side, move the chicken pieces to the cooler side of the grill. Cover the grill and cook undisturbed for 20-30 minutes. 
Turn over and baste with Ogre Sauce: Cover the grill again and allow to cook for another 15-20 minutes. Repeat, turning the chicken pieces over, basting them with sauce, covering, and cooking for another 10-30 minutes. The goal is to maintain a low enough grill temp so that the chicken cooks "low and slow". 
Finish with a sear on the 2nd side: The chicken is done when you insert the tip of a knife into the middle of the thickest piece and the juices should run clear. 
Paint with more barbecue sauce and serve.
BLOODY OGRE
8 shots vodka 
5 pieces of bacon (1 piece of bacon for crumbling into drinks, 4 for garnish) 
2 cups tomato juice 
1 cup Ogre Sauce
2 teaspoons prepared horseradish 
1/2 teaspoon celery salt 
2 teaspoons hot sauce  
1 teaspoon Worcestershire 
Cracks of black pepper 
2 cups ice 
Pickled stuff like olives, green beans, pickles, etc.
Prepare bacon* for drink and garnish by heating a frying pan on medium heat. Fry the bacon until extremely crispy.
Remove to a plate with a paper towel to absorb the excess fat. Crumble one of the pieces of bacon into very small pieces.
Pour all ingredients and the crumbled pieces from one slice of bacon into a blender and blend on high for 1-2 minutes.I love using the blender because it breaks down the bacon into very fine bits.
Pour over four glasses full of ice.
Thanks to everythingbutthe.com for the original recipe.

campaign.story:
Designed by Justin Blaske (Area 1851), Mint Works is a refreshingly light worker placement game for 1 to 4 players with easy-to-learn rules and exciting strategic gameplay, all in about ten minutes.
Its compact size makes it easy to put in your pocket and take it anywhere. Coupling that with its approachable ruleset, Mint Works is a great tool for introducing new players to the genre of worker placement.
Check out the Mint Works rules to see more detail about what makes Mint Works tick.
All Cards contained within a copy of Mint Works are printed upon 300GSM blue core card stock. Tokens are made from 4mm thick wood. All printed components will have a linen finish.
Rahdo Runs Through
Rahdo and James Hudson's Final Thoughts
Eduardo Baraf Video Preview
Board Game Geek Comments
"A twenty minute Euro is hard to make, and even harder to make fun. This game delivers all that and more in a nifty little package."
- MHGreenleaf
"Amazing little worker placement game. I've play-tested this multiple times and am anxiously awaiting the Kickstarter"
- nlwelch
You can download the rules here
During the game each player will have a limited number of Mint Tokens, which represent their workers.
Players will use these mint tokens to earn more tokens, take first player or buy and build plans.
Plans are how players earn points. Some plans will only give points, others will give extra powers to the owner.
Once a player has at least 7 points, play continues until the end of the the round, at which point the game ends.
Whoever has the most points provided by plans they have built wins! 
Five24 Labs on Social Media:
Facebook
Twitter
Newsletter
Mint Works was created in response to the 2015 Mint Tin Design Contest created by R4D6 on BGG. The list of constraints for the competition were as follows:
The game must fit within a mint tin.
That was it! Such a simple constraint, but it gave me the push I needed to come up with a fun idea.
Because a mint tin is so easily portable, and designed to be rugged enough to fit in a pocket, I considered making a game that would be good on the go. (Initial versions of the game actually used the mints that came in a tin as the tokens. This stopped shortly after my children ate them.)
I thought, what would be a good game to carry around in your pocket that isn't typical for that form factor. Worker Placement would be neat, I thought and so I ran with it. The rules turned out to be fairly simple and so I realized I had a super portable gateway worker placement game.
Mint Works will be something you can carry with you on a day to day basis and use it to introduce new people into our amazing hobby of strategic gaming.
That wasn't enough though, the game shouldn't be boring after a few plays. I wanted something that would be re-playable. Something that, once you got the initial concepts down, you could start to really dig in with other players.
Reports from testers over the months have come in saying that they enjoy playing, and will sit down 1 v 1 and play several games in a row and discuss theories about optimum turn sequences, what plans are best picked up at which parts of the game or when the lotto might show up.
This blew my mind! I had managed to do it, make an easy to learn fun to continue to play type of game.
The wall of contributors is my way of giving people some recognition regardless of the amount of contribution they have provided. It's small currently, but as I continue to do more and more campaigns I hope it can grow large enough that I'll have to re-consider how it works.
If you are excited enough for Mint Works that you just can't wait for the fully produced copies to get here from the factory, I have provided a limited pledge level.
This level will entitle you to a copy of the fully factory produced version of Mint Works as all other backers, but it will also include a hand made advanced copy delivered shortly after the campaign ends.
The advanced copies will be entirely hand made by me in my workshop and numbered. (e.g. 03/50.)
The advance copies will be of similar quality to the prototypes that you  see in the review videos. See below for examples.
Because Mint Works is a small game in terms of physical size and weight, shipping costs are very reasonable. The manufacturing costs are low enough that VAT shouldn't be a concern.
I wish that I could provide free shipping to the majority of places, however the low price point of the game means I have very little wiggle room for costs. That said, I will be providing free shipping within the US, and applying a discount to shipping elsewhere equal to the cost of shipping within the US.
Here is a brief chart explaining the shipping costs:

I would like to support retailers who are interested in getting Mint Works before the game makes its way into distribution.
If you're a retailer, please send me a message here on Kickstarter, or email retail@five24labs.com during the campaign for pricing information. 
Currently we are a small but potent team that consists of myself, my buddy Mel and my awesome testing group. I'd like to use this space to acknowledge and thank them.
I have an amazing, excellent and dedicated group of players that tolerate my crazy ideas and endless iterations. They are up to the task of attempting to break things, and giving real feedback as we develop projects.
 I can't possibly thank them enough for all the work they do for the wages of snacks and fun!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This campaign is only my second campaign, and my first (Area 1851) didn't fund initially. This was the result of some poor choices I had made during setting up and ramping up into the campaign, that in turn resulted in its funding failure.

Fortunately enough, Game Salute was able to bring it back a while later and that project successfully funded and is in stores now. This has provided me with a little more insight into what goes on beyond the campaign.

This means that a lot of what will be going on post funding will be new to me. So I'll be doing a bit of learning on the job as this project progresses. That said, I'm always open to hearing advice and willing to take reasonable suggestions into consideration.

Since my previous campaign, I've also backed a lot more projects, and I've seen a lot of good examples of what to do, and what not to do. I'm going to be taking all of those lessons to heart.

Another thing going for me with Mint Works is the size of the project. This will greatly reduce the risk of the entire endeavor.

The biggest risk I foresee at the moment is coordinating the production of the mint tins and the game. This is because the manufacturers I've talked with either can't get tins in the right size, or the cost of the ones they offer in the right size is far too high.

This means I have to have the tins produced in a second factory, then sent to the game manufacturer, where they will affix labels to the tins and pack them with the game components.

Having the tins meet the game components and getting all of that packaged up in a timely manner will be the toughest part I suspect.

However, I'm committed to full transparency of the project and will do my best to ensure things go according to plan.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Our Story  
We're a gear design and manufacturing company based in San Francisco. Our mission is to make quality everyday gear for the modern professional. We're always looking to find ways to streamline how we carry, travel, and go about our daily lives. All of our products are designed and crafted in the USA.
The PMK - Paracord Magnet Keychain & Badgeholder
The PMK is a detachable keychain and badge holder that combines the convenience of magnets with the strength of a snap buckle.
The concept of the Paracord Magnet Keychain & Badgeholder (PMK) was inspired by our Riflesnap Keychain. We liked the security of the snap-hook design, but wanted to expand upon the idea. After a few months of prototyping, sampling, and road testing, the PMK was born. Created with the urban professional in mind and designed for everyday carry, the PMK stays secure to your belt loop via a stainless steel snap shackle and is fitted with a Fidlock magnetic snap for maximum convenience.
Built Tough and Handcrafted in the USA
The PMK is built with a heavy duty, black-oxide, stainless steel snap shackle that securely attaches to your belt loop and/or backpack clip. The snaps can be quickly released by tugging on the pull and easily closed with one hand. Shackles are made here in the USA and laser engraved in California.
Laser engraved stainless steel snap shackles. Note: We etched our logo on the backside so you won't be a walking billboard.
The PMK is hand-weaved in our San Francisco workshop from Type III 550 paracord, commonly used in parachuting and survival gear. In emergency situations, the paracord on the PMK can be used for survival purposes.
Paracord has an internal 7-strand nylon core for added strength.
The Convenience of a Magnet with the Strength of a Snap Lock
The magnetic snaps allow quick and easy access to your keys - simply pull the magnet lever to release your keys/badge when needed, and snap them back on when done - all without having to remove the PMK from your belt. 
Designed with Fidlock magnetic snaps for convenient access to keys. Snaps are made from Neodymium magnets coated with hard Delrin.
The magnets eliminate the need to fumble around for your keys and lock securely in place when not used.
Once engaged, the magnetic snap is extremely strong.
The magnets automatically guide the pieces together without you having to fish around for a connection. Once engaged, the snaps will not come apart unless the main lever is deliberately lifted by the user.
Compact Design
Most quick-release and magnet keychains are bulky and tend to be very long due to the large footprint of either the snap or the magnet. We've designed the PMK to be compact and slide neatly into your pockets.
Multipurpose and Flexible
Whether you commute by foot, drive, frequently valet, or badge in for work, the PMK is designed to help serve any daily purpose.
Customized to Your Style
Choose from three base colors and customize it with your own unique paracord pull.
Pull colors available in Crimson, Charcoal, Olive, and Black.
Additional Pull Colors - Navy Blue, Camo Green/Brown, Yellow

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our team is experienced in new product launches and understand the risks involved. We've all backed kickstarter projects before where the creators couldn't deliver, and we're mindful of this. Our first priority is to ensure fulfillment of all backer rewards. If we see that our funding is approaching our realistic capacity to fulfill, we will cap our funding early to ensure all of our backers get their rewards, even if we raise less money.

We've already gotten a head start and pre-ordered supplies for our early-bird backers, and will start early production during the campaign. Our product is handmade in the USA and thus requires a higher level of labor. We want to ensure that each PMK meets our quality standards, and we will not rush through the manufacturing process at the expense of compromising product quality.

We build the PMK in-house at our workshop in San Francisco, so we have substantial control over production and fulfillment. Nonetheless, there still are risks involved with turnaround time for raw materials from our suppliers. Most of our materials are sourced right here in the USA, with the magnetic snap being the only part sourced overseas (manufactured by Fidlock, a German company). A risk we foresee is the extended turnaround time to bring in additional magnetic snaps.

To mitigate this, we have pre-established relationships with our U.S.-based suppliers and distributors. We have reconfirmed that supply levels will be available and with reasonable turnaround to mitigate this risk. As the product is hand-assembled, there may be some risks with labor capacity, but we look to manage this with capping the amount raised. Nonetheless, we are committed to be transparent to our backers, and to keep them regularly updated with production progress.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Gr2 sphere is a modern design element with a secret storage inside. It combines machined looks with pure elegance using anodized aluminium, polished brass and copper. Every detail is made to perfection with precision machining.
    Created to store and protect all those precious small items and keep your space beautiful and minimalistic. The goal was to make it look outstanding without any signs of opening. A simple and modern design piece that compliments any desk, table or shelf.  
    SECRET STORAGE: Gr2 has a screw off top that reveals the secret place inside. It is perfect to keep any small valuables or make a luxury gift box. You can store pretty much anything that comes into your mind and fits in the bore. It's machined with precision so the fact that it opens will be secret of yours.
LUXURY GIFT BOX: Unique and beatiful way to present a gift to your loved ones. Comes with black foam to put most exclusive gifts.
LOW CENTER OF GRAVITY: Even whithout the acrylic glass stand Gr2 will stay still on flat surfaces. The copper and brass tips are much heavier than aluminium which makes gravity center lower and prevents sphere from rolling.
CONVERSATION STARTER: While creating our project we met lots of interested people and enjoyed many exciting discussions. Gr2 is certainly a great way to start a conversation. 
  We all love to make our environment more beautiful and more personalized. Our space is where we feel good. Design elements can be a reflection to our personality or even tell a story about us.
Crafted with precision and perfected to the smallest detail Gr2 is meant to be a statement of your best qualities.
It is unique way to show how different materials can highlight and complement each other. An optical pleasure on your table with a secret inside.
We use two color options for anodized aluminium body and two tip materials. Altogether four design choices are available. You can combine various designs or choose the most suitable for your taste.
4 different designs
  CNC Machined: Precisely machined on CNC lathe from solid piece of aluminium, copper and brass. Both parts have a thread to open the sphere. Aluminium body has drilled bore inside to create the storage space. Video shows a part of machining process:
PLAY

  Anodized finish: To get the best looking and most durable surface finish for aluminium we use anodizing. This process strengthens and dyes the metal so the surface is very durabe and the color won't flake off or scratch.
Polished: For copper and brass parts we use polishing. It creates a stunning mirror clear finish which is even more highlighted when combined with anodized aluminium. 
Patina process
Brass and copper are unique metals that will attain beautiful tarnish over the time. It is slow and very interesting process that can be followed day by day. The parts will slowly darken and get their own unique pattern. Whenever you like to reset the first day shiny looks it is super easy done with our polishing kit (felt cloth & polishing paste) -included in rewards. In less then two minutes it is clear as new.

As Featured On
All are unpaid press & media coverage. Latest coverage: Front & Center on NewsTimes. Click on the image below to read the article.
    Here's a new way to inject a little life to your drink...Introducing Aura Glass.
What is Aura Glass? Here are a few ways to describe it:
SPILL PROOF GLASS FOR WINE AND SPIRITS
AERATES WINE WITH A TOUCH OF A FINGER
FUN. ELEGANT. CONVERSATION STARTER
How many different styles of wine glasses have you used? Traditionally there are 2 basic categories – a stemless or stemware.
Aura Glass redefines the basic shape of the wine glass. Unlike any other glass, this patented glass pivots on a stainless steel ball. The weight of the ball, the resting height and the angle of the glass, together provide stability, preventing accidental spills even with full pours.
And it is easy to swirl without requiring any more than a touch of a finger. Spins easily even with a 12 ounce pour...
Check out the Coasters added as the stretch goal. Spin it, Sip it, Rest it... Repeat! And when you're done, Stack it away! More information on Update#7, 8 and  9. Click on image below for update#7.
    We are currently offering a large sized Aura Glass ideal for wines, brandy, whiskey, bourbon, and plenty of other drinks including craft beers.
Now you can enjoy any drink without the fear of knocking over your glass.
 Enjoy Wine
 And/Or Spirits
And storage is easy too...
Here's the near-final packaging.
Please note all rewards will come in packs of 2 regardless of the quantities ordered. That will allow you to order as many for yourself, and more to gift to friends and family. Remember you will have these glasses much before Christmas, so stock up and create that unique surprise!
  Few of the many reactions on social media:
"The aromas are magically enhanced in this glass. No need for aeration because this ingenious glass helps the wine open up with each sip..."
"This is so cool... I have never seen anything like this before"
"I always spill wine... I need these"
"Such a great idea... great design... where can I get these?"
"The base is nice and stable... I like the quality of the glass... very unique"
"These would make a fabulous gift!"
Here's a peek at different phases that have brought us to this stage.
Over the past 2 years, we have created dozens of prototypes using different shapes, angles, materials, and sizes.
There's more science in the design than meets the eye. With our engineering backgrounds we've been able to optimize the center of gravity, the resting height & weight of the glass. And we now have a final design to bring to market.
  As part of product testing, we validated the 2 most essential elements of Aura Glass.
1) The stability of the glass: We spun the glass multiple times, with different pour levels, including with the maximum of 15 oz, and the result was that Aura Glass spun easily without spillage or tipping over.
2) The effectiveness of aeration: We used a Dissolved Oxygen Meter and tested the impact of aeration on Aura Glass, along with a control group (a regular wine glass) and another aerating device.
The results of the study was: Aura glass' "swirling" generates an increase in the dissolved oxygen rate within the wine (2 revolutions per minute in this study).
Using the 20 minute average mg/L measurements, Aura glass showed a 25% increase in oxygen over the control (stem glass) and 18% increase over the pour thru aerator, that showed an initial spike in oxygen which dissipated over the next 2 mins. (Refer to the graph below)
  The design of Aura Glass promotes what we refer to as "continuous aeration", meaning that the user is likely to spin Aura Glass more often than a traditional wine glass.
  Through targeted market testing and exhibiting at wine festivals we have gathered valuable feedback attesting the need for a spill proof glass. The response has been extremely encouraging, endorsing the authenticity, quality, and uniqueness of Aura Glass.
During market testing, we offered large and small sized glasses and found that 73% customers preferred the larger size. Based on this feedback, we are focused on bringing the large glass to market as our first product line.
  With an impeccable design and strong demand projections, we are focused on making the business scalable. We visited 4 key suppliers, which are leaders in their respective industries. We evaluated the suppliers across parameters such as general capability, design control & consistency, quality control, reliability, and sustainability.
As a result we have chosen the key suppliers and have approved the 3-D models (the white model shown below) for the next steps, which is the sampling run followed by the large scale production run.
That's where we need your help. Both of those final steps require upfront capital.
  As mentioned above, we are at the final stages of going into mass production which requires upfront commitments for expensive tooling. We want to exploit the cost efficiencies of minimum production runs, and pass those savings on to you, making this product more affordable.
Being made in the USA is one of the founding principles of our company. Additionally, high quality and certainty of execution are central to our business.
Keeping the above in mind, we are here on Kickstarter requesting you to help us bring this product to life.
By backing us you will:
be one of the first owners of this chic product 
support American jobs
By combining our capital with the funds raised on Kickstarter, here's how the capital will be allocated:
  We are committed to quality and delivery timelines. We have done all the leg work and are ready to hit the production run. So together let's create a Different "Pour"spective.
      Keven and Ankana have 32 years of combined experience in Quality, Sales, and Operations.
As the head of Quality, Keven led a large team supporting an organization of 8,000 employees, focused on continuous product and process improvement. What does that mean for you? With his leadership and entrepreneurial mindset we are confident about certainty of execution and high quality products.
As for Ankana, her diverse experience from process improvement, project management to sales & account management across North America, Australia, Europe, and Asia has helped create a very strong foundation for Aura Glass. Thanks to her attention to detail and keeping the customer at the center of solving any problem, we know we are off to a great start.

We already have overcome our biggest challenge of perfecting the prototype.

Having said that, meeting demand is an anticipated risk that many startups face. Our strong background in not only project management and quality, but also operations, equips us to mitigate the risks of delays. To begin with, we have chosen a reputable supplier & a manufacturer that are leaders in their respective industries. And that alleviates any questions with the "ifs"... and it's just a matter of "when".

The only risk we foresee is the timeline within which the manufacturer can meet our design specifications. We understand it creates a dependency which we will continue to monitor and push with a sense of urgency. Needless to say, we will keep all our backers informed along the way.

We want you to trust us, believe in us, and know that we will not disappoint you.
